sect2.title: Video Player
sect2.para: GNOME includes the popular Totem video player, using GNOME's GStreamer multimedia framework. Totem provides the intuitive user interface that GNOME users expect, with automatic hardware detection instead of complex configuration.

sect2.title: Audio Extraction
sect2.para: The much-loved Sound Juicer "CD ripper" easily extracts audio from CDs for later playback on your PC or portable music player. Thanks to automatic downloading of song titles, you won't need to click more than a couple of buttons.
